column4: Traffic;Siem Reap: A------ tree uprooted in the village of Boeng Don Pa
column7: has injured at least one person and halted traffic. The incident occurred at around5:00 pm on September 11
column9: a team led by the Governor of Siem Reap is cutting back the tree
column10: while the victim(s) have been sent to the hospital. ------POST NEWS
